channel.title: Past Events on MiR Community
channel.description: Recent content in Past Events on MiR Community

item.title: Industrial & Organization Psychology with R
item.description: Industrial & Organization Psychology with R In this webinar, MiR Community member, Felix Wu will share how he and lab mates Evan Mulfinger, and Leo Alexander III use R as Industrial Organizational Psychologists. They will highlight an R Shiny app for adverse impact analysis and a study focusing on the impact of the Americans with Disabilities Act

item.title: My R is your R too
item.description: My R is your R too While the R community has made strides in increasing the representation and participation for women and users from underrepresented regions, there are still members of the R community that have expressed desires for a more inclusive space in addition to these strides. In addition, there are unique challenges that underrepresented R users experience in their respective workspaces or academic environments.

item.title: Getting to know dplyr w/Daryn Ramsden
item.description: Getting to know dplyr with Daryn In this webinar, RStudio certified instructor, Daryn Ramsden will go over the basics of wrangling data with dplyr! He will also highlight some of the new functions from recently updated dplyr 1.0.

item.title: ggplot2 with Shelmith Kariuki
item.description: ggplot2 with Shelmith Kariuki Do you want to learn ggplot2 or increase your confidence in ggplot2? In this webinar, Shelmith will go over the basics of ggplot2 to get you going!

item.title: RStudio Instructor Certification Panel
item.description: RStudio Instructor Certification Panel Join RStudio Instructor Certification Panelists Greg Wilson, Yanina Bellini Saibene and Shelmith Kariuki for some fun!
